= Introduction =

The project collects resource, programming examples and slides which are presented during the lecture _"Concepts of Modern Programming Languages"_ ([https://is.cuni.cz/studium/predmety/index.php?tid=&do=predmet&kod=NPRG014 NPRG014]).

The lecture introduces various features of the following languages:
  * Groovy
  * Scala
  * Erlang
  * !JavaScript

The demonstrated features are:

|| *Feature*                  || *Languages*     ||
|| Static meta-programming    || Groovy          ||
|| Dynamic meta-programming   || Groovy          ||
|| Domain-specific languages  || Groovy, Scala   ||
|| Functional programming     || Groovy, Scala, Erlang ||
|| Concurrency                || Groovy, Erlang, Scala ||
|| Distributed concurrency    || Erlang ||
|| Prototype-based programming || !JavaScript, !CoffeeScript ||
|| Dynamic scripting          || Groovy, !JavaScript ||
|| Web programming models     || Scala, !JavaScript (Node.js) ||
|| Lazy data structures       || Erlang ||
